questions.uddipok: Terrorism has become viral all over the world. Now, develop a paragraph on 'Terrorism'.

sub_questions.explanation:
Terrorism
Terrorism is a serious problem in Bangladesh and all over the world. It means using fear, threats, and violence to harm innocent people. Terrorists attack public places like markets, schools, mosques, and offices. They want to create panic so that people feel unsafe. In Bangladesh, we have seen some terrorist attacks in the past, which shocked the whole nation. Many families lost their loved ones, and people became afraid to go outside. All over the world, many countries have also suffered from terrorism. Terrorists sometimes use bombs, guns, or sudden attacks to hurt people. These attacks destroy peace, stop normal life, and create fear in society. Tourism becomes weak, business suffers, and development slows down. No religion in the world supports. killing innocent people, but terrorists try to misuse religion or politics for their own goals. There are many reasons behind terrorism. Some people are poor, uneducated, or mísguided by bad leaders. Some terrorist groups want power, control, or money. Young people are often targeted and given wrong ideas. To stop terrorism, the whole world must work together. Bangladesh, along with other countries, needs strong laws, good education, and awareness. Parents and teachers must guide children toward peace. If we all stand united, we can build a safe and peaceful world for everyone.

sub_questions.explanation:
The Headmaster
Rajshahi Govt. Girls' High School
Rajshahi

Subject: Application for Full Free Studentship

Sir,
With due respect, I would like to inform you that my family is going through a terrible financial crisis. My father is a fourth-grade employee in a private institution and the only earning person in our large family of eight members. Among us, four are school-going children. It is very difficult for my father to bear all the expenses of our family. Because of this financial problem, my parents are finding it hard to continue my education. If I get full free studentship, it will help my family a lot and allow me to continue my studies without any worry.
Therefore, I humbly request you to kindly grant me a full free studentship. I promise to study harder and make good results in the future. I will remain grateful to you for your kind support.

Yours obediently,
Anika Binte Ahmed

questions.uddipok: Write a composition on 'Artificial Intelligence: Embracing Positivity for Progress'.

sub_questions.explanation:
Artificial Intelligence: Embracing Positivity for Progress
Artificial Intelligence, or AI, means smart machines and computer programs that can do work like humans. Today, Al is becoming a very important part of our lives. If we use AI in a good and positive way, it can help Bangladesh grow and develop.
Al can make our work faster, easier, and more accurate. In Bangladesh, doctors are using AI in hospitals. AI can help them find diseases early, read reports quickly, and give better treatment. This can save many patients. Al is also used to predict the weather. It can warn us about floods, cyclones, and storms. Since Bangladesh faces natural disasters every year, this warning system can save many lives.
In education, AI is becoming a great helper. Students can learn lessons using AI apps and websites. These apps explain things in simple language. They can also help weak students practice more. Teachers can use Al to prepare class lessons and check homework faster. This makes teaching and learning easier and more enjoyable. In agriculture, AI is very useful. Farmers can use AI to know the best time to plant and harvest crops. AI can tell them about rain, soil condition, and insect attacks. This helps farmers produce more food and lose less. In offices and factories, AI helps manage work, reduce mistakes, and save time. Many young people in Bangladesh are starting new businesses-using AI, which is good for our economy.
But we must be careful while using AI. We should train people so that they can use AI in the right way. should support humans, not harm them or take away their jobs completely.
If Bangladesh uses AI positively, our country can progress faster. Al can improve health care, education, farming, business, and disaster management. It can make life easier and safer for everyone. By embracing the good sides of AI, we can build a stronger, smarter, and more developed Bangladesh.
